paper_abstract: Codebooks (also called signal sets) meeting the Welch bound on the maximum correlation amplitude are called MWBE codebooks and are desirable in code-division multiple-access systems. Two different but related constructions of MWBE codebooks from difference sets were developed by Xia et al. and Ding recently. The objectives of this correspondence are to present a generic construction of MWBE codebooks that contains the previous two constructions as special cases and describe new MWBE codebooks that cannot be produced by the earlier two constructions.
paper_title: A generic construction of complex codebooks meeting the welch bound
